metadata.title: CVE-2018-14447 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
trim_whitespace in lexer.l in libConfuse v3.2.1 has an out-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14447` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libconfuse-common - 3.2.1+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1
libconfuse2 - 3.2.1+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: confuse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.1+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1').
